title: She Likes Homos, Not Me – Sequel​ - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Psychological   School Life   Slice of Life   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Based on a Song   Character Growth   Chuunibyou   Depression   Fujoshi   Romantic Subplot
author: Naoto Asahara
description:
This is an extra, “unofficially published” edition of Naoto Asahara’s previous work,”She Likes Homos, Not Me.”

Description of the previous novel: 

“Jun Andou, a high school student that hides he’s homosexual, accepts confession from a fujoshi named Sae Miura and starts dating. However, Jun also has a male lover that he has a sexual relationship with...

Jun’s only support comes from his classmate Sae, and his only friend that shares and accepts the suffering of his, is someone online with the username ‘Mr.Fahrenheit’.

…What’s the ideal relationship between Jun and Sae who are at odds with each other and their worlds? An emotional coming-of-age drama centered around a boy and a girl that would’ve never otherwise interacted, desperately trying to protect their crumbling relationship.”>
